org.zuinnote.hadoop.ethereum.format.common

Class EthereumBlockReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zuinnote.hadoop.ethereum.format.common.EthereumBlockReader

  • public class EthereumBlockReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parses Ethereum RLP-encoded blocks

    • Constructor Detail

      • EthereumBlockReader

        public EthereumBlockReader(java.io.InputStream in,
                           int maxSizeEthereumBlock,
                           int bufferSize,
                           boolean useDirectBuffer)
        Initialize a reader
        Parameters:
        in - InputStream containing Ethereum blocks
        maxSizeEthereumBlock - maximum size of an Ethereum block for processing. This is to avoid misinterpretation or overflows when reading blocks (cf. also gas limit, https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Design-Rationale#gas-and-fees)
        bufferSize - read Buffer size. If set to 0 then the InputStream passsed as a parameter will be used
        useDirectBuffer - experimental feature to use a DirectByteBuffer instead of a HeapByteBuffer
